mapper.select: SELECT t.id id, FUNC_GET_USERNAME(t.teacher_id) teacherId, FUNC_GET_DEPTNAME(t.dept_id) deptId, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.meal_card_type, 'FKLX') mealCardTypeShow, t.meal_card_type mealCardType, to_char(t.meal_card_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') || 'T' || to_char(t.meal_card_time,'hh24:mi') mealCardTime, to_char(t.meal_card_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') mealCardDate, t.remark, t.request_flag, t.creator, t.create_time, t.create_dept, t.changer, t.change_time, t.change_dept, t.valid_flag FROM T_BG_MEALCARD_HANDLE_WF t WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY t.create_time desc
mapper.update: update T_BG_MEALCARD_HANDLE_WF SET teacher_id = #{teacherId}, dept_id = #{deptId}, meal_card_type = #{mealCardType}, meal_card_time = to_date(#{mealCardTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), remark = #{remark}, changer= #{changer}, change_time= sysdate, change_dept= #{changeDept} WHERE id = #{id}
